[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”#ffffff” rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”#f8f8fb” rc_bg_gradient_direction=”180″ desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” padding_top=”20vh” scroll_section_title=”Intro”][vc_column vertical_content_position=”middle” mobile_text_align=”center”]


Webkey


for business

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-up” animation_delay=”600″ animation_duration=”slow”]Webkey is a remote control and management tool for Android.

With Webkey you can connect your devices over WiFi or 4G and control them from a central web Dashboard.[/vc_column_text]

Contact Us
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” padding_top=”10%” section_id=”bfeatures”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]At Webkey, we work hard every day to make life easier for our business clients;
from small and micro business to the largest organizations.
We developed our app to be ready to help you better control your business Android devices anywhere around the world without having to go through a difficult set-up process, with easy to understand pricing plans.
We are also ready to work together with larger organizations, offering our highly customizable Professional Plus packages and the Business edition of our app.

Find out more:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

About the features
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
About the prices
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” padding_top=”10%” section_id=”bfeatures”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_bg_type=”color” padding_top=”10%” rc_bg_color=”#f6f5f6″ section_id=”editions”][vc_column]

Editions

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”custom” rc_bg_type=”color” equal_column_height=”equal” tablet_sm_columns_vertical_gap=”60″ mobile_columns_vertical_gap=”60″ rc_font_color=”#b1b4b6″ rc_bg_color=”#f6f5f6″ section_id=”features” padding_bottom=”10%”][vc_column width=”1/6″ rc_heading_color=”dark” tablet_sm_width=”1-2″ rc_font_color=”#20242e”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ rc_heading_color=”dark” column_custom_position=”yes” tablet_sm_width=”1-2″ tablet_landscape_column_positions=”none” tablet_portrait_column_positions=”none” mobile_column_positions=”none” rc_font_color=”#20242e”][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_heading_color=”dark”][vc_column_inner full_height=”yes” rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”medium-shadow” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1614836970146{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 8% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Standard

This edition of Webkey is available from the play store.
All features are available for Android remote control however some features may require a rooted device.

Free for one device.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_heading_color=”dark”][vc_column_inner full_height=”yes” rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”medium-shadow” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1614836979505{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 8% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}” rc_font_color=”#0a0a0a”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Business

This edition of Webkey is recommended for business purposes; special business features are available like

  • Headless version
  • Fleet ID
  • Pre-Installed Webkey client

and other custom features

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”custom” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” section_id=”usecases” padding_top=”10%” padding_bottom=”10%”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1562878446069{padding-right: 180px !important;padding-left: 180px !important;}”]

Use Cases

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

POS and In-store Retail devices

Remote management of cashiers, terminals and digital scales

Find out more
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Digital warehousing

Maintaining barcode scanners, tablets, wearable devices

Find out more
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ rc_font_color=”#3d3d3d”]
[vc_column_text]

POS and In-store Retail devices

Today there is a growing use of android mobile devices – vending machines, kiosks, advertising to name a few apart from the classic mobile use. Point-of-sale devices in particular have had a significant increase in recent years. These devices streamline the sale at the end customer, but managing devices located on multiple sites can be a challenge. Providing remote support to a number devices from a central IT team is a solution that allows not only instant real-time support, but saves money and time to both the end-user and to the team managing these.

Another reason why remote management of POS android devices has to be considered is the end user: it can not be expected that the user holding the actual device will be technologically savvy enough to be able to navigate on the device on their own, however making an IT technician go to the location all the time is not feasible. Remote access management seems to be the answer to both of those challenges.

An additional advantage to use remote access management to POS android devices can be if these devices can be grouped and managed accordingly. Rolling out a new app to these groups or collecting data from them can be simplified further optimizing the processes.

Compared to most of the previous technologies, many of the android POS devices are in fact mobile; this means that tracking their geographic location is a must in terms of security and a source of useful insight from the possible data that can be gathered.

At Webkey, we have a solution ready to all the above issues. We understand these challenges, as we have faced them while helping our customers. We are ready to help you as well, so do not hesitate to get in touch![/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_column_text]

Digital Warehouse and logistics

The transportation and logistics (T&L) industry has experienced a boom during the COVID-19 pandemic. Additional to this, the mobile devices from smartphones to IoT devices have brought about a world in T&L that means fiercer competition than ever before.  With all the increased volumes, the technical opportunities and expansion of the industry it is key for any players involved with transportation, logistics, shipping or warehousing to stay ahead of their competitors. 

One way to ensure that a T&L company stays ahead of the race is to implement mobile device management (MDM solution) softwares that enables you to have better control and overview over your fleet of devices. A cleverly set-up Mobile device Management software can help secure your data, control information centrally, track them via GPS or provide immediate and central support. 

It would be a luxury for any T&L company to lose time or money because of devices that are down due technical errors. With Webkey, it is possible to provide support from a central station to any Android devices that are out on a mission with the drivers. Webkey helps you to overcome all sorts of issues from broken screens obscuring vital information to making sure that all other apps on the Android devices are up-to-date across all devices in your fleet.

Tracing your devices on maps is almost a must-have these days: Webkey can show a group of devices on a map – in addition to some of the obvious logistical advantages, this can further allow you to gather information from your devices when they are in a certain area or display ads on your devices when they are in certain locations. 

Security of operations and data are of the highest importance in the T&L industry. Webkey has a ready answer as remote control sessions are encrypted between the browser and your device by SSL/TLS certificates. The pairing of devices always requires a PIN eliminating the malicious pairings. Additionally it is possible to run Webkey on a local access network on servers owned by you, removing many possibilities of data loss on the world wide web. 

We strongly believe that we at Webkey have the solution for you even if you are just starting to digitize your small warehouse or if you are already a global logistics player. Get in touch to get custom made solutions and pricing to best suit your needs! [/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

IT Management, Advertisement and Entertainment

Digital kiosks, set-top boxes, mobile device fleet management

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Education

Managing educational content on classroom tablets

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”custom” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” section_id=”usecases” padding_top=”10%” padding_bottom=”10%”][vc_column]

Use Cases

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

POS and In-store Retail devices

Remote management of cashiers, terminals and digital scales

eut-modal-popup
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Digital warehousing

Maintaining barcode scanners, tablets, wearable devices

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

IT Management, Advertisement and Entertainment

Digital kiosks, set-top boxes, mobile device fleet management

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Education

Managing educational content on classroom tablets

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”custom” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”6845″ rc_bg_image_type=”parallax” rc_bg_color_overlay=”custom” rc_bg_color_overlay_custom=”rgba(20,20,20,0.5)” padding_top=”10%” padding_bottom=”10%” rc_font_color=”#ffffff” rc_bg_color=”#141414″ scroll_section_title=”Contact”][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” rc_font_color=”#ffffff”]
[vc_column_text]

Our customer i-Data offers integrated vehicle fleet management and navigation solution for spedition companies.

With Webkey i-Data can control and manage on-board tablets in real time, update software and track the vehicles’ location.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”5x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”5x”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Unitech, Taiwan

Unitech is a Taiwanese barcode scanner manufacturer. For security reasons they were looking for a partner that integrates with their MDM solution. Webkey has provided Unitech with a server based remote access to their devices, that now runs on their local access network.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Brooklyn, New York

With speakers all across the US in reatail stores, they wanted to save time and energy on maintenance and IT management. Webkey has helped Activaire integrate their own with solution for a centrally managed IT maintenance system.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Board of York School, Canada

The board leverages Webkey to centrally control their educational devices (tablets, interactive boards) in K-12 institutes.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Digimevo, Spain

Digimevo spain displays educational content in medical facilities across Spain. They found it difficulty to maintain all their devices in their fleet. Webkey has been helped them to control the management and maintenance of their Android devices centrally.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type=”fullwidth” padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_bg_type=”color” scroll_section_title=”Contact” section_id=”bsecurity” rc_bg_color=”#101215″][vc_column width=”1/2″ full_height=”yes” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”color” expand_column_bg=”expand-bg-left” rc_bg_color=”#145cff” rc_font_color=”#ffffff”]

Support
and Maintenance

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text animation_delay=”200″]Private server licensing has a yearly fee, which includes installing and set up costs.

Yearly fee also includes updates and bug fixes during the contract term.

On-site support is available upon request.

 

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” full_height=”yes” rc_bg_type=”color” rc_bg_color=”#101215″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”]

Security
…

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text animation_delay=”600″]For full control and security, upon agreement, Webkey can offer a local, private server to use our service.

While using Webkey, all remote control sessions are encrypted between your browser and your device by SSL/TLS certificates.

Pairing devices always requires an access code (PIN) to avoid accidental or malicious pairings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”custom” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”6268″ rc_bg_image_type=”parallax” rc_bg_color_overlay=”custom” rc_bg_color_overlay_custom=”rgba(20,20,20,0.5)” padding_top=”10%” padding_bottom=”10%” rc_font_color=”#ffffff” rc_bg_color=”#141414″ scroll_section_title=”Contact”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ text_align=”center”]

Ready to take control?

Contact Us
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row rc_bg_type=”color” rc_bg_color=”#000000″][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
